unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swears by Ayurveda. Every Diwali, she gets an Abhyanga massage. Once, after a nasty fall during Onam celebrations in Kerala, she opted for Ayurvedic treatment instead of allopathy. She recovered so much faster! Dr. Sharma at the local Ayurvedic clinic, near Secunderabad, is amazing. The Rs. 500 consultation fee is worth it. He even suggested a special diet! I'm thinking of trying it out myself, maybe for my aching back after that 10 km hike last week.
